title: 518.551 POSTSECONDARY EDUCATION TRUST FUND.
text:
[Repealed, 2005 c 164 s 31; 2006 c 280 s 43]
[Renumbered 518A.50]
[Repealed, 1983 c 308 s 32]
[Repealed, 1983 c 308 s 32]
[Repealed, 1983 c 308 s 32]
[Renumbered 518A.44]
[Repealed, 2005 c 164 s 31; 2006 c 280 s 43]
[Renumbered 518A.28]
[Repealed, 2005 c 164 s 31; 2006 c 280 s 43]
The parties may agree to designate a sum of money above any court-ordered child support as a trust fund for the costs of postsecondary education.
[Renumbered 518A.38, subd 5]
[Repealed, 2005 c 164 s 31; 2006 c 280 s 43]
